title: COVID19 Care for Media
description:
COVID 19 Care for Media is an android application particularly designed to facilitate Pakistani media/journalists to stay updated about coronavirus pandemic and report cases as and when required. This app can be used by any person seeking latest updates on COVID-19 globally and in Pakistan. This app is endorsed by Cyber Wing, Ministry of Information and Broadcasting, Government of Pakistan.
•	What is COVID-19 and How it spreads?
•	What are its symptoms?
•	How to prevent yourself and others?
•	Latest updates/ statistics (Global and Pakistan)
•	What are the myths about COVID-19?
•	Helpline numbers and testing laboratories details
•	Report COVID-19 cases through in built app SMS service (intended purpose of use to identify Caller ID, spam detection, and/or spam blocking) and also gives an option directing users to call on toll free number (feature only for media)
Note* Standard SMS charges applicable as per your mobile operator
